episodes.title: Ex-2x2 Support Group Admin Chat - Episode 3: Convention Recap 2025
episodes.description: That's right, the admins have been virtually attending more conventions than a fresh convert proving their worthiness to the workers. Are we insane? Probably. Is it cathartic? In some strange masochistic way, absolutely.

episodes.title: Ex-2x2 Support Group Zoom Chat with Dr. Janja Lalich
episodes.description:
Admins of the Ex-2x2 Support Group on Facebook discuss aspects of the 2x2 church with cult expert Dr. Janja Lalich. 

More information about Dr. Lalich and her work in the cults and coercion field can be found at: 
https://www.lalichcenter.org
and
https://janjalalich.com/

episodes.title: WA/NID/AK Staff Meeting - Guidelines Rejection - 6/4/24
episodes.description:
This is a recording of a WA/NID/AK staff meeting, taken on June 4th, 2024. The main voice in the beginning portion of the call is Darryl Doland, overseer of WA/NID/AK. Other voices are members of that region's ministry.

The purpose of the meeting was to address a set of proposed regional guidelines for handling CSA/SA in the fellowship. These guidelines had recently been completed by a special team which included CSA professionals, who had spent the last several months on this task in coordination with the ministry.

Early in this recording, Darryl Doland makes clear that he will not be moving forward with the guidelines. The general consensus (outside of a few voices of dissent) was that a brand new guidelines document may or may not be created - presumably by the ministry - which involves much more scripture. 

The role of the Safety Team (recently formed through a multi-step process led by the ministry) remains unclear without a set of guidelines to lead them. 

**Redacted portions include: 
1. a worker's disclosure of a survivor's identity and story
2. ending prayers

episodes.title: Ex-2x2 Support Group Facebook Live Event with Dr. Steven Hassan
episodes.description:
Learn more about Steve's work at https://freedomofmind.com.

The BITE Model app referenced in this video can be found at https://bitemodel.com. We encourage everyone to complete the survey at that URL. It may be best to use a computer browser, as there could be issues in a mobile browser while the site is being polished.

PDFs of the BITE Model and the Influence Continuum can be found at the below links:
https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model-pdf-download/
https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/influence-continuum/
